ValueSet.Value: The DocumentTypeCode of the message cannot be empty
The ID of the message cannot be empty
The ID of the message contains an invalid character
The ID of the message cannot be larger than 250 characters
The Correlation ID in OriginatorDocumentReference/ID must be present and not empty
The Contact ID in ReceiverParty/Contact/ID must be present and not empty
The Contact ID in ReceiverParty/PhysicalLocation/CountrySubentityCode must be present and not empty
Value supplied is unacceptable for an element controlled by codelist DocumentTypeCode
Value supplied is unacceptable for an element controlled by codelist ParentDocumentTypeCode
Value supplied is unacceptable for an element controlled by codelist SortFieldTypeCode
Period startdate is later than enddate
The IssueDate of the message is in the future
The IssueDate of the message is older than 12 months
The difference between startdate and enddate is larger than one year
PaginationRange From is larger than To
The difference between PaginationRange.To and PaginationRange.From cannot be larger than 1000
The ParentDocumentTypeCode must exist
An ApplicationResponse must not refer to an ApplicationResponse in the DocumentTypeCode element
The ParentDocumentID cannot be empty
The ParentDocumentID contains an invalid character
The ParentDocumentID cannot be larger than 250 characters
Element Period misses child element EndDate
Element Period misses child element StartDate
The Sender Party Endpoint ID and the Receiver Party Endpoint ID must be present in the message payload.
The Sender Party Endpoint ID and the Receiver Party Endpoint ID must be present in the message payload.
The UserID cannot be empty
